class.name: GameplayTag
class.brief_description: A resource representing a hierarchical gameplay tag.
class.description: [GameplayTag] is a simple object that encapsulates a [StringName] representing a tag (e.g., [code]state.buff.speed[/code]). It allows checking hierarchical matching between tags.

method.name: get_hierarchy
method.description: Returns all tags in the hierarchy of this tag (e.g. for "a.b" returns ["a", "a.b"]).

method.name: matches
method.description: Returns true if this tag matches the other tag (exact match).

members.member: The full name of the tag (e.g. "state.buff").
